subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{wikipedia|lang=ja|フッ素|フッ素 (Fluorine)}} {{wikipedia|Fluorine}} [[File:Liquid_fluorine_tighter_crop.jpg|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|弗}} (''futsu''): a sample of chilled liquid '''[[fluorine]]'''.]]
{{ja-kanjitab|ふつ|yomi=on}} Originally borrowed from {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ふつ}} {{m|ltc|弗|tr=*pjut}}, meaning either “not” or “a [[gust]] of [[wind]]”. Apparently later repurposed during the later [[w:Edo period|Edo period]] for its phonetic value in translating the {{etyl|nl|ja|sort=ふつ}} {{m|nl|fluor||fluorine}}.

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-l|弗化|ふっか|fukka}}: [[fluoridation]]; [[fluoro-]], [[fluor-]]; [[fluorinated]]
* {{ja-l|弗化カルシウム|ふっかカルシウム|fukka karushiumu}}: [[calcium fluoride]], [[CaF2]]
* {{ja-l|六弗化リン酸リチウム|ろくふっかりんさんりちうむ|roku fukka rinsan richiumu}}: [[lithium hexafluorophosphate]]
* {{ja-l|弗化水素|ふっかすいそ|fukka suiso}}: [[hydrogen fluoride]], [[HF]]
* {{ja-l|弗化水素酸|ふっかすいそさん|fukka suiso san}}: [[hydrofluoric acid]]
* {{ja-l|弗化物|ふっかぶつ|fukkabutsu}}: [[fluoride]]
* {{ja-l|六弗化硫黄|ろくふっかいおう|ろくふっかいおう|roku fukka iou}}: [[sulfur hexafluoride]]
* {{ja-l|弗酸|ふっさん|fussan}}: short for {{ja-l|弗化水素酸||fukka suiso san}}: [[hydrofluoric acid]]
* {{ja-l|弗素|ふっそ|fusso}}: [[fluorine]], [[F]]
{{der-mid}}
'''Purely phonetic uses:'''
* {{ja-l|阿弗利加}}, {{ja-l|亜弗利加|アフリカ|Afurika}}: [[Africa]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: Seldom used. In chemistry contexts, almost always spelled in [[katakana]] as {{ja-l|フツ}}, appearing in most compounds as {{lang|ja|フッ}}.

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{wikipedia|lang=ja|ドル}} {{wikipedia|Dollar}} [[File:Dollar_Symbol_Evolution.svg|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|弗}} (''doru''): evolution of the '''[[dollar]]''' symbol for both the [[w:United States dollar|United States]] and (now obsolete) [[w:Spanish dollar|Spanish]] dollar.]]
{{ja-kanjitab|どる|yomi=kun}} Repurposed for its visual similarity to the [[dollar]] symbol '''[[$]]'''. This reading is ultimately borrowed from {{bor|ja|nl|sort=とる'|dollar}}.{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}{{R:Daijirin}}

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: Occasionally seen, but more often encountered in the katakana spelling of {{ja-l|ドル}}.
